pkgmetadata.longdescription: **This plugin is obsolete. ``setuptools_scm >= 7.0.0`` supports Git archives by itself.**Migration guide---------------Change the contents of the ``.git_archival.txt`` file in the root directory of your repository from:: ref-names: $Format:%D$to:: node: $Format:%H$ node-date: $Format:%cI$ describe-name: $Format:%(describe:tags=true)$ ref-names: $Format:%D$Remove ``setuptools_scm_git_archive`` from your project's dependencies (e.g. the``setup_requires`` list in your ``setup.py`` file).
